data.actual_result: The error message 'Your nickname could not be changed on...' appears and is cut off
data.expected_result: An error message mentioning the 32 character limit should be displayed in full
data.short_description: Long nickname error text is incorrect/cut off
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Server Settings - Tap Members - Select any member - Enter a nickname exceeding the 32 character limit and tap Done
